name: GayMail - RainbowJam2019
description:
This game was made for RainbowJam2019. Send letters of support and love to little blobbys throughout the world <3 

No endgame, no ultimate goal, just enjoy exploring and relaxing <3

CONTROLS: 

WASD to move

SPACEBAR to jump

LEFT CLICK to deliver mail

P or ESCAPE to pause

Also, my first upload to itch and my first packaged + built game! Woo!

Artstation: https://www.artstation.com/heartlessblaze

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AlexTaylor_Art

BGM by https://www.bensound.com/
